name: Not Again
description:
You wake up.

You have woken up again, again, and again.

You are tired of waking up.

Every time, you die, and then you wake up again.

You can almost remember...

The dream is almost familiar. Every time, you remember a little more!

You have to keep trying! It doesn't matter what the dreams say, you can do it!

You can reach the exit.

CREDITS
  • Rachel Wilson - Lead artist
  • Dominic Zotti - Level designer
  • Anvit Srivastav - Lead programmer
